question: What is the purpose of a GitHub Actions workflow?

answers.text: Automates tasks such as build, test, and deployment on GitHub
Monitors the health of your repository
Hosts a static website on GitHub Pages

question: Which file defines the steps in a GitHub Actions workflow?

answers.text: A set of steps that are executed on the same runner
A command run on your local machine to trigger actions
A repository in which workflows are defined
A step that installs dependencies in the workflow
